english: Today is the 5th (fifth) day of April.
I was born on the 13th day (thirteenth) of December.
I was born on the day of the 13th (thirteenth) of December.
I was born on the thirteenth of twelve (December 13).

Finnish: Onko sulla nimipäivä? Milloin se on?
english: Do you have a name day? when is it?
When did you come to Finland?
